name: Sushil Bagate

experience.title: Recommendation System Project
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Implemented User based & Item based Collaborative Filtering using User Similarity and Item Similarity Matrices to make predictions.‚Ä¢ Filtered out the products based on user ratings and found out the correlations between the ratings of various products with the others.‚Ä¢ User Product data was generated using the random value generator of numpy. In this model Cosine Similarity (KNN) was Used.

recommendations: Rahil Tamboli ‚ÄúSushil is a very sharp, intelligent and hard working professional. He is an active contributor in his role and always looks out for ways to add more value. Overall very flexible and keen on learning new things.‚Äù

LinkedIn User ‚ÄúHappy that he chose to work with me for 2 months directly and boy I had so much to learn from him and that was 2 years back. Always calm and positive about work and the best part is he never ever got irated on the various assignments that were laid out to him. He came up with creative ideas and was always eager to contribute in ways he could possibly do. We are still connected and I still take his help on various assignments instead of 'thora gyan' that I share with him. I wish him all the best for his future endeavours.‚Äù

projects: [{"title":"COVID19 Data Analysis Using Python","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"‚Ä¢ Imported COVID19 dataset and prepared it for the analysis by dropping columns and aggregating rows.‚Ä¢ Decided on and calculating a good measure for our analysis.‚Ä¢ Merged two datasets and found correlations among our data.‚Ä¢ Visualized our analysis results using Seaborn."},{},{"title":"Neural Network Visualizer Web App with Python","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"‚Ä¢ Created a Neural Network Visualizer web application using Streamlit, and a simple model server using Keras and Flask. ‚Ä¢ Used Keras to train a Neural Network model, and used Keras' functional API to create a model with multiple outputs. ‚Ä¢ Created a web application that will visualize the outputs of all the nodes of all the layers of the neural network for a given input image."},{"title":"Nano-indentation Testing for Strain-Rate Sensitivity Analysis | Under: Prof. Debalay Chakrabarti | IITKGP","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"‚Ä¢ Did Constant Strain Rate(CSR) Test at Maximum Strain rate on the specimen to obtain Hardness vs. Depth Curve.‚Ä¢ From the obtained curve determined the Depth at which Indentation Depth Effect Vanishes.‚Ä¢ For Strain Rate Jump Test, at variable indentation depths, the abrupt changes are made at different indentation strain-rates.‚Ä¢ Analyzed the relation between Strain Rate Sensitivity and DBTT (Ductile to Brittle Transition Temperature )."},{"title":"Medium Mn Steel for Automotive Application | Under: Prof. Tapas K Bandyopadhyay | IITKGP","start_date":"Jul 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"‚Ä¢ Analyzed the characterization of the forged specimen by SEM image and EBSD(Electron Back scatter Diffraction)phase map.‚Ä¢ Examined Optical Micrographs of the specimen annealed for 15 mins, 30 mins, 60 mins, 120 mins at 1273K temperature.‚Ä¢ The medium-Mn steels possess raised ductility and it additionally helps in lowering the production cost over the 2nd-generation AHSS."}]

organizations.title: Spectra IIT Kharagpur
organizations.description: Spectra is a fine arts society of IITKGP where we organise events for the children near the campus to develop awareness and skill. We also put a lot of effort to visit their school and color the walls of the school with vibrant and playful painting offering soothing sight for the children.As a Governor:‚Ä¢ Maintained a successful record of managing 40 students, Organized major events including ARTBEAT 2019 with a footfall of over5000.‚Ä¢ Revived ARTBUD-2018 the art competition for the students from std.1st to 10th from 9 schools in Kharagpur.‚Ä¢ Directed, for the first time,Art Attack- Drawing Activity for IIT KGP Alumni in collaboration with Alumni Cell, IIT Kharagpur.‚Ä¢ Managed a budget of Rs 50000 and supervised the Logistics of the organized workshops, exhibitions, and other collaborative events.
